x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Canceling Reservation does not reflect on the map view.
When the Interpret mode is on and I cancel a reservation -> All reservation related records in all tables are Closed Cancelled, but the reservation map is still showing the location as reserved.
Seen in Pre-Pakistan releases.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Canceling Reservation does not reflect
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Please Apply the Update Set for your current version to Fix this issue.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_8370fab21b855550ae5b21b5ec4bcbf5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Canceling Reservation does not reflect on the map view.

When the Interpret mode is on and I cancel a reservation -> All reservation related records in all tables are Closed Cancelled, but the reservation map is still showing the location as reserved. 

Seen in Pre-Pakistan releases.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Canceling Reservation does not reflect </name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Please Apply the Update Set for your current version to Fix this issue.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var spaceVersion = '';
var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
gr2.addEncodedQuery('name=Space^active=True');
gr2.query();
while (gr2.next()) {
    spaceVersion = gr2.version;
}

var spaceVersionNo = spaceVersion.split(".");
var spaceVersionNumber = spaceVersionNo[0].toString();

var chkProperty = util.getSystemProperties('com.glide.script.interpret.short.expressions');

if (chkProperty == 'true') {
    if (spaceVersionNumber == '3') {
        util.handleOutput('Please apply Update Set "Latvia(SFM-7863 SFM-7534 combined).xml  which solves the issue involving inability to cancel reservations', 'warning', 'Reservation');
    } else if (spaceVersionNumber == '4') {
         util.handleOutput('Please apply Update Set "Mexico_SFM-7863.xml" which solves the issue involving inability to cancel reservations', 'warning', 'Reservation');
    } else if (spaceVersionNumber == '5') {
         util.handleOutput('Please apply Update Set "Norway_SFM-7863.xml" which solves the issue involving inability to cancel reservations', 'warning', 'Reservation');
    } 

}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prasanna.Phadtare@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-05 10:52:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>8370fab21b855550ae5b21b5ec4bcbf5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Canceling Reservation does not reflect </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_8370fab21b855550ae5b21b5ec4bcbf5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
